snippet: Victoria Gonzalez never hid her illness from her two sons, and scholarships for summer camp offer them a respite from the severity of everyday life
abstract: Samuel Field Y, beneficiary agency of UJA-Federation of New York, which is one of the organizations supported by The New York Times Neediest Cases Fund, helps pay for Victoria Gonzalez's children to attend summer camp.
lead_paragraph: Victoria Gonzalez never hid her illness from her two sons, and scholarships for summer camp offer them a respite from the severity of everyday life

headline.print_headline: Faith Is Sustaining Family Through Mother’s Tumor
